title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for downloading, building and running large language models locally with minimal setup.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server, published to npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI; offers sync/async APIs and streaming.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for use in chains, agents and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting with local models, model management and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive TUI (text UI) that wraps the Ollama REST API for chatting in the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem providing a simple client for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM library for Ollama with Kotlin extensions, available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal Next.js chat app that streams responses from a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset-ai letting you use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with both REST and gRPC wrappers.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST endpoints that expose Ollama models to web frontends with built-in rate limiting.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a side-panel chat powered by local Ollama models for note assistance.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets server members chat with Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local LLM power into channels with per-user thread isolation.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama API with GenServer-based process management for fault-tolerant chats.

title: ollama-macos-swiftui
summary: Native macOS SwiftUI menu-bar app for quick chats and model switching with Ollama.
